replies.body:
Where do you actually watch the games?!?  I cannot find these anywhere. 

Did Riot forget to record and upload these or do they just want to save them for an Easter egg hunt?
All broadcasts are on watch.lolesports.com - Today's match is at 3 PM PST and Saturday and Sunday's matches begin at 12 PM PST.

Hmm, it looks like I can go to watch.na.lolesports.com but it only has what is currently playing. 

I'm trying to find the games from yesterday or a way to watch the games that aren't live. Unfortunately, due to that evil thing called work I can't watch the majority of games while they are live. 

Do you know of any place I could watch yesterday's games or that has a rebroadcast?

Did you check YouTube? 
here is one from the B stream on May 25.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lksKMg5eruA
Subscribe to uLoL YouTube and look up their videos, they are all there, I believe.
Awesome!  I kept going to the regular LoLesports YouTube. This is a huge help. Cheers!
man UofT needs some jersey/jackets lol, they look like a rag tag bunch of guys lol
Does anyone know what elo these people are?
D3 to masters mostly. i think one or two of them are challenger
3 PM PST would be 6 PM EST, so, why is the final game starting at 3:45 EST?
